body:
I am looking for stupid questions to ask to mods. I came up with these.

- Will I get banned if I spleef myself?
- Can I swear in another language and not get kicked?
- Am I pretty enough?


Looking for your magical opinions.

İAdios unicornos!

title: Stupid Questions Time With Punalama

replies.body:
1. No
2. You will be kicked depending on the severity/if it's directed
3. Yes
replies.body_tagged:
1. No
2. You will be kicked depending on the severity/if it's directed
3. Yes

replies.body: Thank you mod sir but I am asking for new questions from my unicorns here to ask to you. Just for fun sir.  :)
